name: Slime Rampage
description:
Slime Rampage is a game developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Join together card pieces to attack, defend and heal yourself in ruthless combat! The murderous rampage never ends! (Spoiler: It does. There's not an infinite amount of levels.)

The valiant red feathered knight is "taking care" of the local slime "overpopulation" in his local forest. Little does he know, his bloodthirsty actions will have repercussions...

How to play

1- Select two cards that you want the effects to swap.

2- Select the three cards that you want to play. Beware! The remaining cards will be played by the enemy. 

3- Press the button "Next turn" or the space bar of your keyboard to see the outcome.

4- Defeat the enemy to win!
